item.title: Best ideas come from a penniless inventor
item.description: Resources thinking is the trick of being very smart and only using means that don’t cost anything. The conventional way to solve problems is to throw money at it, but resources thinking is about finding free or very cheap ways to solve problems. The protagonists in “Shawshank Redemption” and “The Count of Monte Cristo” actually use resources to escape out of prison. Murali Loganathan and Bala Ramadurai describe resources in this 4th podcast of TRIZ India.
